name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 18, Guilin University of Electronic Technology forced Chinese students to move to the old dormitory building with poor conditions.
The original dormitory building was vacated for international students to live in.
The school compensated each student 50 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @nict570npc Then you are welcome to check every one of my posts and point out any problems. I will accept them humbly.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 19, it was reported online that an accident occurred during a test run on Xi'an Metro Line 10.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 19, the Beijing Half Marathon Organizing Committee announced the investigation and handling decision on the results of the men's race.
The article stated that several foreign runners in the video were "pacemakers", but Xtep did not clearly mark the pacemakers, resulting in several people participating in the race with athlete numbers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 19, the PLA established the Information Support Force, which is directly led and commanded by the Central Military Commission.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A Xiaohongshu netizen said that due to the strict crackdown on illegal overseas work, the entry and exit ports of Chengdu Airport have become extremely strict.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 19, the spokesperson of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs expressed firm opposition to Japan's launch of the fifth round of Fukushima nuclear wastewater discharge into the sea. However, this matter seems to have been cooled down by the platform.
In addition, today is the day when Japan's nuclear wastewater officially arrives at the coast of my country.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Following Chongqing, netizens in Chengdu, Changzhou, Hefei, Nanchang and other places have reported a surge in gas bills at home.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 17, the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government Security Bureau issued a message stating that since the Hong Kong National Security Law came into effect, as of March 8, a total of 291 people have been arrested by the Police Force for suspected acts and activities endangering national security, ranging in age from 15 to 90 years old.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Eat Chicken Tonight"
April 18, Jingdezhen Health School, Jiangxi Province.
Because the school security guards did not allow the vendors to set up stalls at the school gate and tore off the payment code posted on the stalls, the two sides had a dispute.
The vendor was furious and threw all the chicken legs he sold into the school, causing students to scramble for them

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the afternoon of April 19, Jingdezhen Health School issued a notice: At around 21:00 on April 18, when our students were returning to the dormitory after evening self-study, they passed by the walled section along the street. Mobile vendors outside the wall took the opportunity to hawk their wares and had an argument with our school’s order maintenance staff. They threw food into the wall, causing students to gather to catch the food. Next, our school will learn from this incident, strengthen campus management, and further enrich the meals in the school cafeteria on the basis of ensuring food safety.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Subsequent update
On the evening of the 19th, a Xi'an Metro employee said it was a train collision test, not the accident reported online.
